summary: Provides utilities to treat local files as flow parameters and artifacts in Metaflow, handling path normalization, content loading, encoding, and uploading to various storage backends. Includes classes for representing file paths, embedded file metadata, and two uploader implementations that manage URL generation, size calculation, and persistence of file data.
business_intent: Allow users to embed or reference external files within Metaflow workflows, ensuring the files are automatically uploaded, versioned, and made available to all steps of the flow without manual handling.
